title.jp: Akumu Hana wo Chirasu toki! Yami no Joou Fukkatsu

synopsis: Hotaru Tomoe has visions of Eternal Sailor Moon. Setsuna arrives at the Tomoe house to pick her up. The girls and Mamoru gather in the park to discover that Chibi-Usa is returning to the future. Meanwhile, Queen Nehelenia is freed from her mirrored prison by an unseen voice. As Chibi-Usa uses her time key to return to Crystal Tokyo with Diana, Nehelenia remembers the events that happened before she had been sealed in the mirror again and she produces her own soul-mirror. Angered, she breaks the mirror and shards fly everywhere. The Soldiers view the shards as shooting stars, but Mamoru recieves one of them in his eye as Chibi-Usa is about to step into the time portal. Unfortunately, the portal disappears leaving the girls puzzled. Later that night, many people gather at an aquarium, including Haruka and Michiru. Some of the nightmare shards land on the roof and form into Nehelenia's Mirror Paredories. Haruka and Michiru are surrounded when Dead Scream is used and Sailor Pluto appears w

title.jp: Saturn no Mezame! Sailor 10 Senshi Shuuketsu

synopsis: Michiru and Haruka are suprised to see that Hotaru has grown into her normal age, and Sailor Saturn appears. Neherina talks with Mamoru.

title.jp: Noroi no Makyou! Akumu ni Torawareta Mamoru
Unmei no Ichiya! Sailor Senshi no Kunan

synopsis: Chibiusa is not doing so well after Mamoru is captured, she begins to disappear because without Mamoru she cannot exist.

title.jp: Ai Yue ni! Hateshi naki Makai no Tatakai
Ai no Moon Power! Akumu no Owaru Toki

synopsis: Sailor Moon and friends finally defeat Neherina for good, and rescue Mamoru from her. Now everyone is okay, but Chibiusa and Diana decide to leave for the future for good.

title.jp: Wakare to Deai! Unmei no Hoshiboshi no Ryuuten

synopsis: With Neherina down, everything seems to be okay, that is until Galaxia and her animates show their ugly heads. Now, Sailor Moon and gang have another problem, the Sailor Starlights, friend or foe? Also, Usagi watches the departure of Mamoru who heads off to college in America.

title.jp: Gakuen ni Fuku Arashi! Tenkousei wa Idol

synopsis: Everyone at Usagi's school is excited that the Three Lights are transferring to Juuban High.  Seiya gets Usagi to show him all the clubs in school.  The football team's captain is turned into a phage named ""Sailor Guts"" by Iron Mouse.  The other Inner Senshi are shocked to learn about the new soldiers.

title.jp: Idol wo Mezase! Minako no Yabou

synopsis: Minako becomes the Starlights assistant. Usagi also follows her. Sailor Tin Cat takes Saki's star seed. ESM and Venus soon restore it.

title.jp: Fighter no shoutai! Shougeki no Chouhenshin
Hoshi ni Takusu Yume to Roman! Taiki no Henshin
Luna wa Mita!? Idol Yaten no Sugao
Teki? Mikata? Starlights to Sailor Senshi
Yobiau Hoshi no Kagayaki! Haruka-tachi Sansen
Seiya to Usagi no Dokidoki Date
Uchuu Kara no Shinryaku! Seiren Hirai

synopsis: Chibi Chibi arrives in this episode. Pluto tells the sailor scouts to just be on guard around her. Chibi Chibi, like Chibiusa, makes Usagi's family believe that she is Usagi's younger sister. Sailor Aluminum siren first appears in this episode. She takes a police guard's star seed, but it wasn't a real star seed. ESM and pluto arrive. ESM uses her starlight honeymoon therapy kiss to return him back to normal. At home, Usagi is dissappointed that she hasn't heard from Mamoru. Then chibi chibi comes in, Usagi asks if she wet her pants while sleeping. Chibi Chibi frowns, Usagi says she can sleep with her. They both fall asleep.

title.jp: Shiryou no Sakebi? Kyoufu Camp no Kaijin

synopsis: Siren turns a potter (Rei's cousin) into a phage after he destroys all his work.  Usagi and the girls go camping and run into the Three Lights (they're filming in the area).  They hear news of the ""Camp Ravager"" in the area.  Seiya decides to scare the girls with the monster costume from their movie, but Usagi and Rei run into the phage instead.  After transforming, Mars realizes it's her cousin and Usagi heals him.

title.jp: Futarikiri no Yoru! Usagi no Pinch
Taiki Zesshou! Shinjiru Kokoro wo Uta ni Komete
Chibi Chibi no Nazo! Osawagase Daitsuiseki
Kagayaku Hoshi no Power! Chibi Chibi no Henshin
Kyoufu e no Shoutai! Usagi no Yakan Hikou
Shimei to Yuujou no Hazama! Sailor Senshi-tachi no Tairitsu
Akasareta Shinjitsu! Seiya-tachi no Kako
Hikari no Chou ga Mau Toki! Atarashii Nami no Yokan
Yume Icchokusen! Idol Minako no Tanjou!?

synopsis: Minako finally gets her chance to audition to be an idol. She realizes that she has to chase her dreams, even in the middle of an attack by the animates.

title.jp: Ubawareta Ginzuishou! Kakyuu Princess Shutsugen
Ginga no Seisen! Sailor Wars Densetsu
Kakyuu Princess Shoumetsu! Galaxia Kourin
Ginga Horobiru Toki! Sailor Senshi Saigo no Tatakai

synopsis: The Sailor Scouts prepare for the final battle against Galaxia. They all transform and prepare to go to thw tower but there is a force filed around it. They think all they can do is watch Galaxia TV as Starlights are attacked by Galaxia. Then, a pink ball of light appears, its Chibu Chibi! She transports them into the tower. They are in front of Galaxia.The Sailor Senshi stand in front of Sailor moon but Galaxia blows them away and then shoots energy balls at them. One goes through each of the them in this order Mercury Venus Jupiter then Mars. Sailor Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, and Saturn cannot believe they are gone. Their star seeds appear and float towards Galaxia. Sailor Mercury, Venus, Jupiter, and Mars say their goodbye. Galaxia shows them all the star seeds she has, Sailor moon notices a golden one in back. It is Mamoru's(Tuxedo Mask's) star seed!

title.jp: Ginga no Shihaisha! Galaxia no Kyoui

synopsis: Sailor Moon mourns the death of Mamoru. Please view the recap for more.

title.jp: Kieyuku Hoshiboshi! Uranus-tachi no Saigo
Kibou no Hikari! Ginga wo Kaketa Saishuu Kessen

synopsis: Sailor Moon prepares for the final battle with Galaxia.

title.jp: Usagi no ai! Gekkou Ginga wo Terasu

synopsis: Sailor Chibi Chibi Moon releases the Light of Hope which causes a mysterious figure to appear. This figure gives Usagi a Star Seed, which turns her into Princess Serenity and a sword created from the Light of Hope. Galaxia is consumed with more rage and hatred as Serenity tries to convince her to end her evil ways. Galaxia manages to destroy the sword, killing Chibi Chibi as the Light of Hope is now gone. Serenity becomes an angel and finally reaches the bottom of Galaxia's heart and releases Chaos from her body. She is finally free and guides all the Star Seeds she had collected back to where they belong. Usagi feels very lonely by herself until all the Sailor Soldiers return, along with her love, Mamo-chan with Chibi Chibi! Chibi Chibi thanks Usagi and leaves. The Starlights' princess is also returned. The inner Sailor Soldiers have a heart-felt good bye with the Starlights and their princess as the outers view them as shooting stars. In the end, Usagi asks Mamoru how much he loves h
